Address.label: Address
Address.value: 8755 WEST HIGGINS ROAD,SUITE 500, CHICAGO, Illinois, 60631, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Littelfuse is a primary provider of circuit protection products (such as fuses and relays) into the transportation, industrial, telecommunications, and consumer electronics end markets. The firm is also increasing its power semiconductor business, where it predominantly serves industrial end markets and is breaking into electric vehicle charging infrastructure. Littelfuse has 17,000 global employees.
